title: In Another Life - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   World Travel
author: 破壶
description:
A “famous” professional swindler living in modern society was living a passionate but also common life. After his big day came, he started for his reincarnation.
Since he had done too many evil things, he deserved to go to hell. But due to an accident in the hell, this powerful professional swindler came to another world by mistake and started a new life…>
